book.synopsis: During a much-needed vacation in Jamaica to escape memories of a painful divorce and her high-pressure job, Caren Blakemore meets the man of her dreams, but she soon discovers that her love affair with Derek Allen, the notorious Tiger Prince, has become the focus of every tabloid in America. Reissue.
